Ich finde das die CSGO einfach löschen solten, und Valve mit samt steam und seinen überteuerten preisen auf die schrotthalde gehört

Maybe a bad experience for Non-Prime Users. I would suggest you to play on third-party Matchmaking (like FaceIT and ESEA) as there are way less cheats on those platforms compared to Valve Matchmaking 
Moreover, Valve Matchmaking is 64-tick on which shooting and grenade throws may feel weird 
Whereas on the other hand, Faceit gives you smooth shooting (Spray/taps)  and grenade throws just feel so much smoother and you'll have a way better experience there compared to matchmaking which is known for Hack Vs Hack These Days! That was my take on CS:GO after playing it for almost 800 hours. :)
